name: EVOJELLY
description:
PvP of evolving Jellyfishes trying to outlive and outgrow eachother.

Designers: Paz Shribman, Sana Shechtman.
Developers: Or Magen, Nadav Alali

Guidance: Dani Bacon, Eran Hilleli

Game Jam class, Bezalel 2020

                                                                                     

INSTRUCTIONS

Player 1 – WASD + LShift (to shoot)

Player 2 – Arrow Keys + RShift (to shoot)
